00042 CachingTargetCalculator::~CachingTargetCalculator() 
00043 { }
00044 
00045 void CachingTargetCalculator::notify_new_patch( PatchData&, CachedTargetData& data )
00046   { data.clear(); }
00047 
00048 void CachingTargetCalculator::notify_patch_destroyed( CachedTargetData& data )
00049   { data.clear(); }
00050 
00051 void CachingTargetCalculator::notify_sub_patch( PatchData& ,
00052                                                 CachedTargetData& data,
00053                                                 PatchData& subpatch, 
00054                                                 const size_t* ,
00055                                                 const size_t* element_map,
00056                                                 MsqError& err )
00057 {
00058     // If no cached data for this patch, just return
00059   if (data.has_data())
00060     return;
00061   
00062     // Create a new cached data object on the subpatch
00063   CachedTargetData& sub_data = get_data( subpatch );
00064   sub_data.clear();
00065   
00066     // populate the element offset list, and count the total
00067     // number of cached target matrices.
00068   sub_data.elementOffsets.resize( subpatch.num_elements() );
00069   size_t count_2D = 0, count_3D = 0;
00070   for (size_t i = 0; i < subpatch.num_elements(); ++i) {
00071     EntityTopology type = subpatch.element_by_index(i).get_element_type();
00072     size_t& count = (TopologyInfo::dimension( type ) == 2) ? count_2D : count_3D;
00073     sub_data.elementOffsets[i] = count;
00074     NodeSet samples = subpatch.get_samples( i );
00075     count += samples.num_nodes();
00076   }
00077   
00078   const bool orient = have_surface_orient();
00079   sub_data.targets3D.resize( count_3D );
00080   if (orient) 
00081     sub_data.targetsSurface.resize( count_2D );
00082   else
00083     sub_data.targets2D.resize( count_2D );
00084 
00085   for (size_t i = 0; i < subpatch.num_elements(); ++i) {
00086     EntityTopology type = subpatch.element_by_index(i).get_element_type();
00087     size_t off = sub_data.elementOffsets[i];
00088     size_t old_off = data.elementOffsets[element_map[i]];
00089     NodeSet samples = subpatch.get_samples( i );
00090     size_t count = samples.num_nodes();
00091    
00092     if (TopologyInfo::dimension( type ) == 3) 
00093       memcpy( &sub_data.targets3D[off], &data.targets3D[old_off], count*sizeof(MsqMatrix<3,3>) );
00094     else if (orient)
00095       memcpy( &sub_data.targetsSurface[off], &data.targetsSurface[old_off], count*sizeof(MsqMatrix<3,2>) );
00096     else
00097       memcpy( &sub_data.targets2D[off], &data.targets2D[old_off], count*sizeof(MsqMatrix<2,2>) );
00098   }
00099 }
00100 
00101 static void populate_data( PatchData& pd,
00102                            CachedTargetData* data,
00103                            TargetCalculator* calc,
00104                            MsqError& err )
00105 {
00106   size_t i, j;
00107   
00108   const bool orient = calc->have_surface_orient();
00109   if (data->elementOffsets.empty()) {
00110     size_t count_3d = 0, count_2d = 0;
00111     data->elementOffsets.resize( pd.num_elements() );
00112     for (i = 0; i < pd.num_elements(); ++i) {
00113       EntityTopology type = pd.element_by_index(i).get_element_type();
00114       NodeSet sample_pts = pd.get_samples( i );
00115       size_t& count = (TopologyInfo::dimension( type ) == 3) ? count_3d : count_2d;
00116       data->elementOffsets[i] = count;
00117       count += sample_pts.num_nodes();
00118     }
00119     data->targets3D.resize( count_3d );
00120     if (orient)
00121       data->targetsSurface.resize( count_2d );
00122     else
00123       data->targets2D.resize( count_2d );
00124   }
00125   
00126   size_t off2 = 0, off3 = 0;
00127   for (i = 0; i < pd.num_elements(); ++i) {
00128     EntityTopology type = pd.element_by_index(i).get_element_type();
00129     NodeSet sample_pts = pd.get_samples( i );
00130     if (TopologyInfo::dimension( type ) == 3) {
00131       assert( off3 == data->elementOffsets[i] );
00132       for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::corners(type); ++j) {
00133         if (sample_pts.corner_node(j)) {
00134           assert(off3 < data->targets3D.size());
00135           calc->get_3D_target( pd, i, Sample(0,j), data->targets3D[off3++], err );
00136           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00137         }
00138       }
00139       for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::edges(type); ++j) {
00140         if (sample_pts.mid_edge_node(j)) {
00141           assert(off3 < data->targets3D.size());
00142           calc->get_3D_target( pd, i, Sample(1,j), data->targets3D[off3++], err );
00143           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00144         }
00145       }
00146       for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::faces(type); ++j) {
00147         if (sample_pts.mid_face_node(j)) {
00148           assert(off3 < data->targets3D.size());
00149           calc->get_3D_target( pd, i, Sample(2,j), data->targets3D[off3++], err );
00150           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00151         }
00152       }
00153       if (sample_pts.mid_region_node()) {
00154           assert(off3 < data->targets3D.size());
00155         calc->get_3D_target( pd, i, Sample(3,0), data->targets3D[off3++], err );
00156         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00157       }
00158     }
00159     else if (orient) {
00160       assert( off2 == data->elementOffsets[i] );
00161       for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::corners(type); ++j) {
00162         if (sample_pts.corner_node(j)) {
00163           assert(off2 < data->targetsSurface.size());
00164           calc->get_surface_target( pd, i, Sample(0,j), data->targetsSurface[off2++], err );
00165           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00166         }
00167       }
00168       for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::edges(type); ++j) {
00169         if (sample_pts.mid_edge_node(j)) {
00170           assert(off2 < data->targetsSurface.size());
00171           calc->get_surface_target( pd, i, Sample(1,j), data->targetsSurface[off2++], err );
00172           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00173         }
00174       }
00175       if (sample_pts.mid_face_node(0)) {
00176         assert(off2 < data->targetsSurface.size());
00177         calc->get_surface_target( pd, i, Sample(2,0), data->targetsSurface[off2++], err );
00178         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00179       }
00180     }
00181     else {
00182       assert( off2 == data->elementOffsets[i] );
00183       for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::corners(type); ++j) {
00184         if (sample_pts.corner_node(j)) {
00185           assert(off2 < data->targets2D.size());
00186           calc->get_2D_target( pd, i, Sample(0,j), data->targets2D[off2++], err );
00187           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00188         }
00189       }
00190       for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::edges(type); ++j) {
00191         if (sample_pts.mid_edge_node(j)) {
00192           assert(off2 < data->targets2D.size());
00193           calc->get_2D_target( pd, i, Sample(1,j), data->targets2D[off2++], err );
00194           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00195         }
00196       }
00197       if (sample_pts.mid_face_node(0)) {
00198         assert(off2 < data->targets2D.size());
00199         calc->get_2D_target( pd, i, Sample(2,0), data->targets2D[off2++], err );
00200         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00201       }
00202     }
00203   }
00204 }

00206   
00207 bool CachingTargetCalculator::get_3D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00208                                              size_t element,
00209                                              Sample sample,
00210                                              MsqMatrix<3,3>& W_out,
00211                                              MsqError& err )
00212 {
00213   CachedTargetData& data = get_data( pd );
00214   if (data.targets3D.empty()) {
00215     populate_data( pd, &data, cachedCalculator, err );
00216     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00217   }
00218   
00219     // calculate index of sample in array 
00220   NodeSet all_samples = pd.get_samples( element );
00221   unsigned offset = all_samples.num_before( sample );
00222 
00223   W_out = data.targets3D[ data.elementOffsets[element] + offset ];
00224   return true;
00225 }
00226   
00227 bool CachingTargetCalculator::get_2D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00228                                              size_t element,
00229                                              Sample sample,
00230                                              MsqMatrix<2,2>& W_out,
00231                                              MsqError& err )
00232 {
00233   CachedTargetData& data = get_data( pd );
00234   if (data.targets2D.empty()) {
00235     if (have_surface_orient()) {
00236       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incorrect surface mesh target type", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00237       return false;
00238     }
00239   
00240     populate_data( pd, &data, cachedCalculator, err );
00241     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00242     if (data.targets2D.empty()) {
00243       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Attempt to get 2D target for 3D element type", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00244       return false;
00245     }
00246   }
00247   
00248     // calculate index of sample in array 
00249   NodeSet all_samples = pd.get_samples( element );
00250   unsigned offset = all_samples.num_before( sample );
00251 
00252   W_out = data.targets2D[ data.elementOffsets[element] + offset ];
00253   return true;
00254 }
00255   
00256 bool CachingTargetCalculator::get_surface_target( PatchData& pd, 
00257                                              size_t element,
00258                                              Sample sample,
00259                                              MsqMatrix<3,2>& W_out,
00260                                              MsqError& err )
00261 {
00262   CachedTargetData& data = get_data( pd );
00263   if (data.targetsSurface.empty()) {
00264     if (!have_surface_orient()) {
00265       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incorrect surface mesh target type", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00266       return false;
00267     }
00268   
00269     populate_data( pd, &data, cachedCalculator, err );
00270     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00271     if (data.targetsSurface.empty()) {
00272       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Attempt to get 2D target for 3D element type", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00273       return false;
00274     }
00275   }
00276   
00277     // calculate index of sample in array 
00278   NodeSet all_samples = pd.get_samples( element );
00279   unsigned offset = all_samples.num_before( sample );
00280 
00281   W_out = data.targetsSurface[ data.elementOffsets[element] + offset ];
00282   return true;
00283 }
